website_summaries.verdict: The perfect way to add style and elegance to your baby shower.
pros: Kit includes pre-strung gold banner, 9 balloons, and 6 feet of gold ribbon
Balloons are durable and can be filled with helium
Gold and white color scheme brightens up any room
Banner can be reused in photo shoots or in baby’s nursery
cons: Confetti balloons deflate faster than the others, also a mess to clean if you accidentally pop one

customer_reviews.title: Alittle disappointed because some balloons had markings on them and wouldn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Alittle disappointed because some balloons had markings on them and wouldn’t come off once I whipped but still overall cute I’ll still use them just hope it’s not as noticeable blown up as it is flat. *UPDATE* they sent in an email refunding me for the little complication of the marks when originally given 4 star because they’re cute balloons and decor! They now by far deserve 5 stars if I could I give more, much appreciated it wasn’t too big of a deal and was definitely not expected but I will be definitely buying again from them their customer service was and is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: These decorations were great and seller was even better! They included a few extras in my order to ensure that I got everything I needed in case something went array during shipping & it was greatly appreciated! The end result was everything I expected and more! Thank you so much!!! I especially appreciate the follow up emails I received from the vendor. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby shower or gender reveal party
customer_reviews.text: These were very pretty, but the confetti ones did not stay blown up for long (as in, they were shrinking during the party)! We had them all blown up just an hour before the party started and they were enjoyed by all.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Great correspondence from owner.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the "Oh Baby" Sign. I hung it up at my main shower table & multiple places around my house both before & after the shower. Balloons were great too. Owner does a great job corresponding & also sent extra balloons in case some pop in delivery. I wish I could give 6 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KMRL

customer_reviews.title: Great product, added extra balloons no charge!
customer_reviews.text: Product was great! Came in very quickly, and they even added additional balloons no charge! Used for. Gender reveal party. The seller followed up to make sure items we're as promised. I would definitely bbuy again for all my party's, very happy with experience!!
customer_reviews.author: Ekarcher29

customer_reviews.title: Your baby shower will be sure to sparkle and shine with these decorations
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for baby shower decorations, look no further! The gold and white colors are perfect for celebrating either gender and really brighten up the room! Each pack includes one sign and three types of balloons (glitter filled, hearts and oh babys). I would recommend ordering at least two packs to make sure you have enough decorations for the entire room, especially since the signs are on the smaller side. Extra balloons were added at no charge and the seller followed up personally to make sure everything was received and met my expectations. I would definitely use them again in the future/recommend them to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The balloons with the glitter were nice but the rest did not look like the picture . The heart prints and oh baby prints were so light they almost blended in. The oh baby sign was great though. Good quality . Changed my review to from 3 to 4 stars because of the customer service received! They read my review and issued me an apology and a refund. They will be contacting their supplier so hopefully the next batch they receive will match the picture that have listed .
customer_reviews.author: shane tjong

customer_reviews.title: The shower decorations are of good quality and ended up being a great value
customer_reviews.text: Everything was included as described and they also threw in a few extras and a personal note! This is not the type of extra service you expect and it was greatly appreciated. The shower decorations are of good quality and ended up being a great value, well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price of this item as well as everything that it came with. I'd recommend getting the balloons filled the morning of your event. Our event was yesterday and the balloons are no longer floating today.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Balloons did not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors but about 3 hours after we filled the balloons they started to fall. My house was warm and comfortable so do not know why this happened!
customer_reviews.author: Patti T

customer_reviews.title: They were so beautiful and actually came with 13 instead of 9 balloons
customer_reviews.text: OMG I wish I would've took pictures! These balloons exceeded my expectations. They were so beautiful and actually came with 13 instead of 9 balloons. Both the white and gold complemented each other so well and upgraded the baby shower look.
customer_reviews.author: Ieisha

customer_reviews.title: Cute balloons
customer_reviews.text: They came somewhat dirty as a manufacture defect but the seller gladly refunded my order. Otherwise beautiful balloons and also came with a small banner and string.
customer_reviews.author: absolutchrista

customer_reviews.title: Love the banner. Balloons are good but had some stains on few of them.
customer_reviews.text: Love the banner. Balloons are good but had some stains on few of them. Didn’t bother me much.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: They were very pretty and just the right amount of decoration
customer_reviews.text: Used these decorations for a baby shower at work for 2 co workers. They were very pretty and just the right amount of decoration. Will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AJM

customer_reviews.title: Great baby shower decorations !
customer_reviews.text: A great decoration for a baby shower! I especially liked the color as the gender of that baby is unknown. Just perfect !
customer_reviews.author: A. Estenson

customer_reviews.title: ... for my sister baby shower and we are very disappointed. Only the sign "oh baby" came in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my sister baby shower and we are very disappointed. Only the sign "oh baby" came in a plastic zip lock bag with hair inside. All the other items that was supposed come with it is missing. Will have my sister return it for me. That is not worth $15.00.🤔👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Millard Younger

customer_reviews.title: How was I missing the letter “b” in baby!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the cost....especially when a b is missing from “baby”.
customer_reviews.author: workingmom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and easy find for your money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely satisfied about these decoration items. They came fast, well packaged and she even add more in case you get carried away blowing these beautiful balloons. I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: phara

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Baby Shower!
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly & everything I could've needed for a cute baby shower for a coworker! oh baby sign was great quality and balloons were pretty- everyone was complimenting them (especially the clear balloon with gold inside!!!!) Would order again :)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and excellent customer service! It’s exactly as pictured. I can’t wait to use these to decorate for my BFF’s birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Decoration set looks awesome on the wall. Giving one star less because when the balloon burst, golden confetti inside the balloon stuck to the floor and was hard to take off.
customer_reviews.author: Shikha Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Wrong decorations
customer_reviews.text: Ordered decorations for a baby shower but received decorations for a wedding shower. Didn’t have time to return or reorder before the shower. We were inconvenienced and disappointed but improvised as best we could.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Regan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these balloons for a baby shower and after they were blown up they popped every time someone moved or touched them. Terrible quality. Would not recommend. I would like my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both product and customer service are great!
customer_reviews.text: Lisa and Dan emailed me right away to ensure I received my decorations and that I was happy with my product. I found both the product and customer service great! I can't wait to use them at the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Schmeds

customer_reviews.title: Quality Decorations
customer_reviews.text: Great set of balloons! The clear latex balloons are much sturdier than the others. The banner wasn't as I expected, but nonetheless, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The decorations are beautiful! The seller is very accommodating and customer service ...
customer_reviews.text: The decorations are beautiful! The seller is very accommodating and customer service oriented! I very much appreciated the extra balloons they included for me! A top buy for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sign and confetti balloons were great but the white heart and oh baby balloons had ...
customer_reviews.text: The sign and confetti balloons were great but the white heart and oh baby balloons had streaks of brown and red all over them like the printing didn't go well and those balloons were unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. A few of the confetti balloons had marks on them however I reached out to the seller and received an immediate response. Would purchase again. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super fast, I havent used them yet but everything looks great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The shower decorations were what I expected: they look like the pictures - delivery was fast and the customer service was way above anything I expected - the follow up and personal touch is very much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The gold looks great, but I was expecting the sign to be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby shower decorations!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute balloons for baby shower! Seller was sweet to follow up and make sure I had received ok.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyPrime

customer_reviews.title: Gender reveal!
customer_reviews.text: They were the perfect amount of balloons for a gender reveal party and added a cute touch. Simple and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. The balloons were perfect for my baby theme. And price was very good compared to party city.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Alay

customer_reviews.title: This seller is very sweet with wonderful follow through.
customer_reviews.text: The products were lovely; the very nice email asking if I was satisfied was a nice touch. I was completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality decoration
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for “oh baby” theme baby shower . Love the balloons. Very strong , none of them broke. We inflate them in the restaurant with helium. The sign was ok too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Same as shown in pictures, perfect for a small baby shower
customer_reviews.author: ANA P

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful customer service and such an adorable product! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Items came in perfect shape. Got them quickly after ordering and they were exactly what I wanted. The balloons and banner will be perfect for my baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Reed

customer_reviews.title: Completed the look
customer_reviews.text: It came right on time. The balloons were great to decorate outside and the sign was a great add on to the table. Thank you for a great product:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: That was perfect! I love the balloons they looked amazing! Like expect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a party and the only item that arrived was the banner. This was a complete disappointment! Don't waste your time or money. Zero stars!
customer_reviews.author: The Question Answerer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For A Baby Shower
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked wonderful and exactly as pictured! I will definitely order from here again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute decorations and good value!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I would order this again to decorate future showers. The mom-to-be was very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a baby shower where the parents don’t know the sex! Added a great touch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The picture is misleading. In the photo, the ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture is misleading. In the photo, the banner looks bold and proportional to the balloons, not so. The word "baby" was folded in shipping. We will use the banner but not as a focal point of decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were amazing for the gender reveal my friend had!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Cute cute cute
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect touch to my gender reveal. So cute, loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Vada;

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The balloons are beautiful! They even sent extras just in case on had a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Oh Baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this. It was the center of my party
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set and great price! Loved the balloons with confetti in them! Was perfect for your virtual baby shower backdrop (thanks world wide pandemic).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Display!
customer_reviews.text: Used for gender reveal. There were a few ripped and unable to inflate however, the package comes with more than one would need so it wasn't a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING DECORATIONS, PERFECT FOR A BABY SHOWER!
customer_reviews.text: These decorations were so cute and perfect for my baby shower (black and gold theme). The banner was perfectly sized (not too small and not too big) and the balloons are just fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Darr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I used these balloons for a baby shower I threw for my best friend. They were great and even withstood the 105 degree Tucson weather well! I would absolutely recommend these, they were fabulous and looked adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gruenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was for a work shower, the balloons were excellent as well as all the decor!
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: ... brown stripes being on the balloons but everything was perfect and nothing was bent
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to order because I saw reviews about red and brown stripes being on the balloons but everything was perfect and nothing was bent. They quickly took care of quality control. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McClinton

customer_reviews.title: Quality balloons
customer_reviews.text: I used these balloons for my gender reveal party and absolutely loved them. We also received extra balloons which was a pleasant surprise! The gender reveal was on 3/9/18 and they haven’t deflated yet! I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cutler

customer_reviews.title: All balloons are stained.
customer_reviews.text: All of the balloons arrived dirty/stained, rendering them useless. Looks like I’ll now have to run out last minute and grab balloons before the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Healy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the items I purchased, everything arrived quickly and in tip top condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved these balloons for a baby shower. They looks so nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Desolis

customer_reviews.title: Confetti balloons may not look like the picture shown
customer_reviews.text: I finally had my shower! Thank you to "YouParty" for adding extra balloons to my package. I had all the balloons filled with helium by "Party City (party supply store)" but the balloons with the confetti were disappointing as the confetti just layed in the bottom of the balloons. They looked nothing like the photo. All the other balloons were beautiful and so was the "oh baby" sign. I don't know what I could have done differently.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie - San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Quality at great price.
customer_reviews.text: Added a splash of pizzazz to my decor. Came quickly just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

product_meta.title: Baby Shower Decorations Neutral Decor Strung Banner & 9PC Balloons w/Ribbon [Gold, Confetti, White] Kit Set | Hang on Wall | Glitter Unisex Pregnancy Announcement Gender Reveal Party by YouParty
product_meta.description:
► Make the Baby Shower Beautiful

Great-looking decorations don't have to take a lot of time and money to do! With our set of a pre-strung banner plus 9 balloons, your baby shower will look amazing and you're not breaking the bank.

► Everything You Need Included!

6x thick card stock letters (“Oh ♡ Baby”)
Pre-strung ribbon for the banner [10 feet long]
9x gold print helium supported balloons with the following colors: 3x-White “Oh Baby”, 3x- Pre-filled Gold Confetti, 3x-White Gold Heart 
9x pre-cut 6ft gold ribbon to tie on balloons

► Measurements and Recommendations

Banner letters vary in measurement from 5.5 inches by 4 inches 
Balloons reach an optimal diameter at 11 inches. If filling with helium, fill the balloon 1 hour before your event for best results.

► Spell Checked in the USA, No Missing Letters

Competitors banners have spelling errors at an alarming rate. Don't settle for a banner spelled "OH BABA" or missing letters! It is too important an occasion to risk! 

► Banner Color Matches Gold Balloons

Create a stunning display with these balloons that color coordinate with the banner! 

► Can Be Used For Other Occasions Too! 

Gender Reveal Parties (Boy or Girl?) & Pregnancy Announcements welcome!
feature_bullets: ✅SET INCLUDES- 7pc Card Stock Banner w/ Gold Twine String [Pre-Strung] | 9x Helium Supported Gold Print Balloons: 3x-White “Baby”, 3x-Gold Confetti, 3x-White Gold Heart | 9x - 6ft Gold Ribbon for Balloons
✅NO ASSEMBLY- Strung banner, pre-filled/weighed confetti balloons, pre-cut gold ribbons!
✅100% GUARANTEE- Love it or your money back, no questions asked.
✅SPELL CHECKED IN USA, NO MISSING LETTERS- Competitor banners have a chance of spelling errors and missing letters. Our banners are spell-checked in the USA. Don't take the chance on other listings!
✅BANNER COLORS MATCH BALLOONS- White & Gold accents make for a beautiful girl baby shower! Banner colors match the balloons to add a stunning touch.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
